about_the_game:
You are an expert in the secret art of the oil massage. So put those skills and those hands to good use and have your way with a cute girl!

Part one in a trilogy of games by developer, Girl's Software!

STORY


It's closing in on the end of summer. Unpromoted, an our protagonist laments the fact that he's had zero encounters with the opposite sex this entire summer. He hopes to make more than a few "special" memories with a girl.

After some mental debate, he comes to the conclusion that the fastest way to make this happen is to find a part time job as a massage therapist specializing in oil massage at a beach house. One day, he catches sight of a young woman outside who is curious about a oil massage and convinces her to come in for a free trial.

It's during the oil massage that he uses his skills to feel her up in all the right places which causes things to further escalate...

Thus begins the intertwined summer memories of our heroine and our oil massage expert.

CHARACTER


Fujisaki Sora
CV: Mito Mio

College Student
Height: 159 cm
3 Sizes: B: 88cm, W: 58cm, H: 90cm
Blood Type: A

An active young woman who dives right in to things she's interested in. In her hometown, she enjoys beach volleyball, scuba diving and surfing. A healthy young woman who looks great in a bikini.

FEATURES

  • Kuri Kuri System: An in-game mode that allows you to touch and fondle Sora. Watch as she erotically reacts to each time you touch her. The more you touch (click) on her, the situation will evolve
  • Dolphin waxing control: No need to click to the end of the scene to finish. That timing can be executed at any time
  • Full character animation: Both dialog and scene portions of the game are animated. Dynamic camera work let's you enjoy all of Sora's good angles
  • Heroine voiced by popular gravure idol, Mitou Mio in her voice acting debut
  • Features English, Simplified Chinese and Japanese language support with Japanese voice audio

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains consensual and nonconsensual sexual content and themes and is not suitable for anyone under the age of eighteen or where adult content is not legal.

name: Kuri Kuri Click! ~My Summer Vacation!~

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Kuri Kuri Click! ~My Summer Vacation!~ - $19.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Kuri Kuri Click! ~My Summer Vacation!~

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.66 GHz and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1600 x 900 resolution, 256 MB VRAM and above
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 760 MB available space
  • Sound Card: PCM Audio Compatible

short_description: The end of summer approaches yet you've had no luck in meeting girls at all. Use the secret art of the oil massage to reverse your fortunes and make some exciting memories with a cute girl in part one of the Kuri Kuri Click series!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
